cards.name: Adiran Survivors
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile two permanent cards from your graveyard.
You may cast Adiran Survivors from your graveyard.

cards.name: Aether Gateway
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Aether Gateway: Create a tapped Plains token, Island token, Swamp token, Mountain token, or Forest token.

changes: 2021-02-01 — Make mechanic replaced with Conjure.
cards.name: Against the Waves
cards.text: Target player mills X cards, where X is two plus the number of cards named Against the Waves in your graveyard. Draw a card, then conjure three cards named Against the Waves and shuffle them into your main library.

cards.name: Aiel Tazan
cards.text:
[+1]: Aiel Tazan deals 2 damage to any target. Then she deals 2 damage to herself unless you have her deal 2 damage to you.
[-3]: Creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.
[-X]: Create an X/1 red Elemental creature token with haste and trample. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step. If X is 6 or more, it gains double strike.

cards.name: Akaima Rager
cards.text:
Haste
Spirited (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may activate one of its activated abilities without paying its cost.)
{1}{R}: Akaima Rager gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Akkrixian Assailants
cards.text:
Trample
Wanderlust — Whenever Akkrixian Assailants attacks, if you control four or more differently named lands, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

cards.name: Akoum Trailblazer
cards.text:
Menace
Whenever Akoum Trailblazer deals combat damage to a player, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
Whenever you discard a card, you may pay {R}. If you do, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

changes: 2022-06-01 — Previously untargetted modes now all target a player.
cards.name: Akrianos' Command
cards.text:
Choose two —
• Target player creates two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
• Exile target attacking creature.
• Creatures target player controls gain indestructible until end of turn.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and untap it.

cards.name: Almgrove Champion
cards.text:
First strike
Cadence (Whenever you cast a spell, if its mana value is greater than this creature's power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
Almgrove Champion can only attack or block alone.

cards.name: Alquyut Mount
cards.text: Alquyut Mount can't attack or block alone.

changes: 2021-05-01 — Banned in MSEM
cards.flavor: The insects in Mauras were exposed to the Hollon years before the Descent, evolving into something now big enough to make any Maurassi afraid of them.
cards.name: Ammbradu Goliath

rulings.text: Ammbradu Goliath's toughness will only be checked before each player gains priority. This means an effect such as 'Draw two cards, then discard two cards' won't result in it having 0 toughness in the middle of the spell resolution.

cards.text: Ammbradu Goliath gets -4/-4 for each card in your hand.

cards.name: Ancient of the Glade
cards.text:
When Ancient of the Glade enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
{2}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: That creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

cards.name: Arboreal Runes
cards.text:
As long as Arboreal Runes is on the battlefield or in your graveyard, it's a Forest land in addition to its other types.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

cards.name: Arcane Duelist
cards.text: Whenever Arcane Duelist becomes tapped, target instant or sorcery card with mana value 1 in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.flavor: The Guardian Act assigned the Arcblade division to the barricade to assist Masha. In truth, they were there to watch her.

cards.text:
Lifelink
Arcblade Enforcers gets +1/+1 as long as you control an enchantment.

cards.name: Arcor Diamond
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Arcor Diamond: Draw a card.

cards.text:
Archive 5 (As this enters the battlefield, shuffle the top five cards of your main library into a new face up library. Sacrifice this after the archived library is empty.)
You may play lands from the archived library.

Trample

Renown 2 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes renowned.)

{T}: Add {C}.
Harmony — Add one mana of any color.
{1}, {T}: Harmonize. (Trigger up to one harmony of one permanent you control.)

cards.name: Artisan's Fountain
cards.text: {T}: Draw a card. Artisan's Fountain doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.name: Artisan of Brutality

rulings.text: If an opponent or permanent is chosen multiple times as a target for a single spell or ability, (for example, an escalated Isolation), the sabotage ability will only trigger once for that player or permanent. If different opponents or permanents are being targeted, the sabotage ability will trigger for each one.

cards.text: Sabotage — Whenever an opponent or permanent an opponent controls becomes the target of a spell you control, Artisan of Brutality gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Autumnal Watch
cards.text: Sacrifice a creature: Exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card.

cards.name: Avatar of Basat
cards.text:
Menace
Avatar of Basat can't block.

cards.text:
Reach, trample
If a +1/+1 counter would be put on another creature you control, instead put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and on Avatar of the Natural.

cards.text:
Create a 5/3 black Horror creature token.

cards.name: Barricade Patrol

When Barricade Patrol enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.
Whenever another creature you control dies, Barricade Patrol deals 1 damage to target player.

cards.name: Blood Frenzy
cards.text:
Target creature gets +3/-3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Bow or Burn

rulings.text: Bow or Burn doesn't care how it was cast from a graveyard, only that it moved to the stack from the graveyard.
Copies of cards are cast from the same zone that the original card was in.

cards.text:
Gain control of target nonland permanent you don't control unless its controller has Bow or Burn deal X damage to them, where X is twice that permanent's mana value. If Bow or Burn was cast from a graveyard, repeat this process for each other nonland permanent they control.
Flashback {6}{R}{R}

cards.name: Breach Titan
cards.text:
Other creatures you control have haste.
Whenever Breach Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, abound. (To abound, you may cast a spell that costs less than this from your hand without paying its mana cost.)
At the beginning of your end step, return another target creature you control to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Burgeoning Blooms
cards.text: Draw X cards, then abound. (To abound, you may cast a spell that costs less than this from your hand without paying its mana cost.)

cards.name: By the Sea
cards.text:
Create a 1/1 blue Otter creature token with “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.”
Wanderlust — If you control four or more differently named lands, create two of those tokens instead.

cards.name: Cane Dancer
cards.text:
Flash
When Cane Dancer enters the battlefield, you may cast target blue instant or sorcery card with mana value 2 from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

cards.flavor:
“Open your spirits in casks, and toast to the spirits in Heaven.”
—Yatiri saying
cards.name: Carnival Yatiri
cards.text: Whenever you gain life, Clerics you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.

cards.name: Centered Acolyte
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, if it isn't your main phase, create a 1/1 white Monk creature token, then creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Champion of Destinies

rulings.text: The monarch draws a card at the beginning of their end step. Whenever the monarch is dealt combat damage by a creature, its controller becomes the monarch.

cards.text:
Vigilance
Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.)
When Champion of Destinies becomes renowned, you become the monarch.

cards.name: Chi Lee of the Underworld

rulings.text: If simultaneous combat damage causes Chi Lee to die and one of her Demons's ability to trigger, that trigger can target Chi Lee, as the trigger will not be put onto the stack until a player gains priority.

cards.text: Whenever Chi Lee attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, create a 4/4 black Demon creature token with “Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, return target card from your graveyard to your hand.”

changes: 2022-06-01 — Updated 'card' wording to 'spell' for Adventures and modal DFCs.
2022-06-01 — Unbanned in MSEM
cards.name: Chigau, the Red Market

rulings.text: Chigau will allow you to cast a spell with that name each turn, but does not bypass timing restrictions. A creature with flash can be cast on your opponent's turns but one that doesn't can't.

cards.text:
When Chigau, the Red Market enters the battlefield, draw a card, then choose a creature card name.
Once each turn, you may cast a creature spell with the chosen name from your graveyard.

{2}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Citywide Automation: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Coat in Petals
cards.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Create a colorless artifact token named Lotus Petal with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”

cards.name: Consult the Dewdrops
cards.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

Lifelink

cards.name: Daughter of Suisei

rulings.text: Daughter of Suisei's ability will always trigger when you cast a spell. It only checks if there is a card with the same name in your graveyard as the ability resolves.

cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell, Daughter of Suisei deals 2 damage to target opponent if that spell has the same name as a card in your graveyard.

cards.name: Deadly Manipulation

rulings.text: You still pay the mana cost and any additional costs of the copied instant or sorcery spell.

cards.text:
{U}, Discard a card: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. If you do, copy it. You may cast the copy.
{B}, Discard a card: Exile target creature card from your graveyard and pay its mana cost. If you do, create a token that's a copy of it. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.text:

cards.name: Derelict Town
cards.text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
When you tap Derelict Town for mana, return it to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Destabilizing the Rifts

rulings.text: Destabilizing the Rifts's second ability prevents you from sacrificing tokens or otherwise moving them from the battlefield to pay costs or as spell effects. If a player casts an Edict effect against you, you must sacrifice a nontoken creature if you have one.

cards.text:
Whenever you create one or more tokens, put a rift counter on Destabilizing the Rifts.
As long as Destabilizing the Rifts has seven or more rift counters on it, creature tokens you control can't leave the battlefield.

cards.name: Devised Companions
cards.text: If you control an artifact, create three 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature tokens. Otherwise, create one of those tokens.

cards.name: Dispersive Volley
cards.text:
Choose one —

cards.name: Entelan Erasure

rulings.text: Once Entelan Erasure has been cast, it is too late to remove the legendary creature or planeswalker.

cards.text: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library. Then each player draws seven cards. If you didn't control a blue legendary creature or planeswalker as you cast this spell, discard three cards. Exile Entelan Erasure.

As long as it's your turn, planeswalkers you control are X/X creatures with indestructible that are still planeswalkers, where X is the number of loyalty counters on them.

rulings.text: Starting with the next opponent in turn order, each opponent may put a card onto the battlefield. If any of those players does, the process repeats, even if you don't have any more cards to play.

cards.text: You may put a creature or land card from your hand onto the battlefield. Then each opponent may put a permanent card from their hand onto the battlefield. If one does, you may repeat this process.

Hexproof

cards.text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)

cards.name: Whispered Wishes
cards.text:
Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, you may pay {W} and exile Whispered Wishes from your graveyard. If you do, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

cards.name: Worlds Away
cards.text:
Wanderlust — This spell has flash as long as you control four or more differently named lands.
Draw four cards.

cards.name: Worlds Colliding
cards.text:
Each player shuffles their hand and each non-Revelation card from their graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. You may put any number of land cards from your hand onto the battlefield.
Coalesce {6}{G}{U}{U} (You may cast this from your graveyard for {6}{G}{U}{U}. If you do, put it onto the battlefield as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)

cards.name: Worldwide Reach
cards.text:
Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, you may put a progress counter on Worldwide Reach.
[PROGRESS 2+] Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
[PROGRESS 4+] Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.

cards.name: Wunderkind Devising

rulings.text: Wunderkind Devising's final ability will override the base PT of Vehicles.

cards.text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may put a progress counter on Wunderkind Devising.
[PROGRESS 1+] At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put each artifact card from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
[PROGRESS 4+] Artifacts you control are artifact creatures with base power and toughness 5/5.

cards.name: Xanigan, the Darkened Cloud

rulings.text: The emblem trigger will resolve before the loyalty ability does.

cards.text:
Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of Xanigan, the Darkened Cloud, you get an emblem with exalted.
[+2]: Xanigan deals 2 damage to up to one target and you gain 2 life.
[-3]: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
[-7]: Xanigan becomes a 7/7 Demon creature with flying and indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to her.

cards.name: Xenocrata's Fleet
cards.text:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may have Xenocrata's Fleet become a 4/4 Ship artifact creature with haste until end of turn.
Whenever Xenocrata's Fleet deals combat damage to an opponent, create that many 1/1 red Warrior creature tokens.
